price: 20. En zij zeiden: “Als het de wil van de Meest Barmhartige geweest was, zouden wij hen niet aanbidden. Zij hebben geen kennis daarover. Zij doen niets anders dan liegen!"
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ شَآءَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مَا عَبَدۡنَٰهُمۗ مَّا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُصُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqālū law shāa al-raḥmānu mā ʿabadnāhum mā lahum bidhālika min ʿil'min in hum illā yakhruṣūna
translations: we would not have worshipped them
we would not have worshipped them
